Translations.Text: Jo eka jhara ahe, jyatuna allahace dasa pitila, tyace pravaha (pata) kadhatila (jikade icchitila)
Je navasa purna karatata1 ani tya divasace bhaya balagatata, jyace sankata cari bajunna pasaranara ahe
Ani allahacya premakhatara gariba, anatha ani kaidyanna jevu ghalatata
Amhi tara tumhala kevala allahacya prasannatesathi jevu ghalato, tumacyakaduna na mobadala icchito, na abhara
Nihsansaya, amhi apalya palanakartyatarphe tya divasace bhaya rakhato jo motha duhsthitica ani kathoratapurna asela
Tevha allahane tyanna tya divasacya sankatapasuna vacavile. Ani tyanna tajelata va ananda pradana kela
Ani tyanna tyancya dhira - sanyamacya mobadalyata jannata ani resami vastra pradana kele
Te tithe asananvara takke lavuna basatila, tyanna tithe na suryaci prakhara usnata janavela, na sakta thandici tivrata
Ani tyancya (jannatacya) savalya tyancyavara jhukalelya asatila ani tyance (meve) ani gucche khali lombakalata asatila
Ani tyancya daramyana candici bhandi ani kacece pyale ye - ja karatila
Kacahi candici asela, jyanna (pinaryanni) anumanane mapuna thevale asela
Ani tyanna tithe asi peye pajali jatila, jyata sunthice misrana asela
Jannatacya eka pravahatuna jyace nava salasabila ahe
Ani tyancya cohikade ti alpavayina balake hindata-phirata asatila. Je nehami (balaka) rahanare aheta. Jevha tumhi tyanna pahala tara kalpana karala ki te (janu) vikhuralele (as'sala) moti aheta
Ani tumhi tithe, jikade pahala tikade purna isadenagya ani mahana rajyasatta disuna ye'ila
Tyancya (sarira) vara hirave maulyavana ani jada resami vastre asatila. Ani tyanna candicya kankanaca dagina ghatala ja'ila ani tyanna tyanca palanakarta svaccha sud'dha (paka) madya pajela
(Pharmavile ja'ila) ha ahe tumacya karmanca mobadala ani tumacya prayatnanci prasansa keli geli
Nihsansaya, amhi tumacyavara kura'ana halu halu (kramakramane) avatarita kele
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya adesavara atala raha, ani tyancyapaiki konatyahi aparadhyace kinva krtaghnace mhanane man'ya karu naka
Ani sakala sandhyakala apalya palanakartyace namahsmarana kara
